Package org.latency4j

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlertHandler
    An interface which defines the contract to which alert handlers must conform.
    Latency4JConstants
    Latency4J library constants.
    LatencyMonitor
    A latency monitor records the duration of tasks [units of work].
    MonitorFactory
    A monitor factory implementation serves as a means of obtaining latency monitors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CappedLatencyRequirement
    Representation of a capped latency requirement.
    EJBLatencyMonitor
    EJB around-method interceptor, which is used to monitor EJB methods.
    LatencyRequirement
    Abstract representation of a latency requirement.
    MonitorFactoryStaticHandle
    Provides a static handle to a default monitor factory implementation.
    StatisticalLatencyRequirement
    A statistical requirement can be used in situations where there is no specific upper bound for operation latency, but monitoring is required to identify operation latencies which deviate from an observed pattern.
    WorkDuration
    Encapsulates the duration of an operation, task or unit of work.
    WorkDurationId
    A duration primary key.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Latency4JException
    Root class of all Latency4J exceptions.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MonitoredByLatency4J
    Method-level annotation which indicates that the method falls under a monitored category as defined in a latency requirement.
